intro.title:
Websites that are easier
for everyone.
intro.body: Is your "site builder" confusing editors and frustrating devs? Time to try tools designed specifically for your area of focus.

editor.title: Edit right on the page
editor.body: Seriously, give it a shot! You can edit this text directly. That's how easy it is to maintain the content on your site.

setup.title: Included Out-Of-The-Box
setup.body: Plenti comes with a lightweight Content Management System for editing your content. No third party software needed to handoff to a client.

setup.title: Git Backend
setup.body: Ditch the SQL headaches and simply connect your site to GitHub, GitLab, or Gogs. Finally content editors and developers can speak the same language (even if they don't know it).

setup.title: Content Structure
setup.body: There are no required fields or content types in Plenti. You define whatever structure works best for you and your project.

setup.title: Svelte Components
setup.body: Build your User Interface with a lightweight and easy to understand component framework. We'll automatically give you HTML fallbacks for your pages and hydrate your single page apps.
